]TEXTFIELDS§
§TAGS[
§features of view mode; view mode features; navigation; readers perspective; read-only mode; view mode; view tab
]TAGS§
§ANNODRAFT[
§
]ANNODRAFT§
§ANNOFINAL[
§<html dir="ltr"><head></head><body contenteditable="true"><h3><font face="Segoe UI" size="4">Features of the View Mode:</font></h3><p><font face="Segoe UI">The View mode is intended for the readers of the documentation. It does not offer the user any editing features.&nbsp;</font></p><p><font face="Segoe UI">The functions which are available in View Mode are all related to information retrieval, such as:&nbsp;</font></p><p></p><ul><li><font face="Segoe UI">Linear navigation through the documentation via the <b>Forward-/Back-Button </b>in the <b>Main Button Bar</b></font></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">Direct navigation to a specific slide via a click on the respective item in the <b>Slide List</b></font></li><li><font face="Segoe UI">Search funktion to find only slides which deal with a specific subject</font></li></ul><p><font face="Segoe UI">If Stop-Motion pictures are cycling through too fast, go to <i>Settings-&gt;Application Settings </i>and then open the <i>General-Tab. </i>Here you can adjust the duration for which each frame is displayed in Milliseconds (Accepted range is 250ms - 25000ms). Click on <i>Save</i>&nbsp;to apply the new settings and close the Application Settings dialog.</font></p><p></p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</body></html>&nbsp;&nbsp;
]ANNOFINAL§
